snippet: The police said Friday that they had disrupted a plot by four people to kill a “large number of individual citizens” in the Halifax area of Nova Scotia.
abstract: Canadian law enforcement says it has prevented plot in Halifax, Nova Scotia, that was planned by four people and was intended to kill 'large number' of people.
lead_paragraph: The police said Friday that they had disrupted a plot by four people to kill a “large number of individual citizens” in the Halifax area of Nova Scotia.

headline.main: Canada: Attack Plot Is Foiled, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Canada: Attack Plot Is Foiled, Police Say
